bill.title: Motor Vehicles; Violations; Towing; Driving Under the Influence
bill.description: Authorizes a police officer to cause to be towed a motor vehicle if the operator is arrested or cited for certain intoxicant-related offenses. Provides exceptions. Provides notice and hearing requirements. (HB1747 CD1)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to TRN, JUD, referral sheet 1
Bill scheduled to be heard by TRN on Wednesday, 02-10-16 10:00AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on TRN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Aquino, LoPresti, Har, Ichiyama, Keohokalole, Nakashima, San Buenaventura, Takayama, Takumi, Yamashita, Tupola; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Johanson.
Reported from TRN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 336-16), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Thursday, 03-03-16 2:00PM in House conference room 325.
Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Rhoads, San Buenaventura, Belatti, Brower, Creagan, Hashem, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Nakashima, Takayama, Woodson, McDermott, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 991-16) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-08-16.
Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 218).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to TRE/PSM, JDL.
The committee(s) on TRE/PSM has scheduled a public hearing on 03-17-16 3:00PM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on TRE recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in TRE were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Inouye, Chun Oakland, English, Nishihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard, Kidani, Slom.

The committee(s) on PSM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in PSM were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Nishihara, Espero, Baker, Inouye; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.

The committee(s) on JDL will hold a public decision making on 04-05-16 9:05AM in conference room 016.
The committee(s) on JDL deferred the measure until 04-06-16 9:15AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDL recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in JDL were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Keith-Agaran, Shimabukuro, Gabbard, K.Kahele, Kim; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) L. Thielen, Slom.
Reported from JDL (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3574) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading.
One Day Notice 04-12-16.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading. Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 1 (Senator(s) Slom). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 529) in amended form (SD 1).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).

Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Wednesday 04-27-16 2:30PM in conference room 225.

Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 25 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
